title: r/Prorevenge My Family Abandoned Me, So I Completely Destroyed Their Lives
description: r/Prorevenge In today's episode, OP was abandoned by her loser father. Decades later, he finds out that her father is in a nursing home, so she sets in motion a revenge plan that destroys her father's house, bank account, and relationship with his other family -- we're talking complete scorched earth. Buckle up, because this is a long and satisfying tale of truly professional revenge.
dc:creator: rSlash Reads Reddit
